EmailTemplate.description: To educate customer how to bookmark research providers on Markit Hub
EmailTemplate.name: Bookmark Hub entitlements
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub new account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
We have checked your Markit Hub account and confirm that you have access to the research entitlements. In case you are unable to see the <Research Provider Name> tabs, please click the "+" icon to bookmark them again.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
